ISIS_GLOBAL_INSTANCE_MUST.desc: ISIS_GLOBAL and ISIS_LEVELS invalidated instance must statement
eStr: The value of ISIS_GLOBAL 'instance' must be the same as 'instance' in ISIS_LEVELS.

ISIS_GLOBAL_VRF_MUST.desc: ISIS_GLOBAL and ISIS_LEVELS invalidated vrf must statement
eStr: The value of ISIS_GLOBAL 'vrf_name' must be the same as 'vrf_name' in ISIS_LEVELS.

ISIS_GLOBAL_INCORRECT_VALUE_MTU_SIZE.desc: ISIS_GLOBAL incorrect value for lsp_mtu_size field

ISIS_GLOBAL_INCORRECT_VALUE_HOSTNAME.desc: ISIS_GLOBAL incorrect value for dynamic_hostname field

ISIS_GLOBAL_MISSING_KEY_VRF.desc: ISIS_GLOBAL missing mandatory key value vrf_name

ISIS_GLOBAL_MISSING_KEY_INSTANCE.desc: ISIS_GLOBAL missing mandatory key value instance

eStr: must only be specified if all other SPF parameters are specified

ISIS_LEVELS_INSTANCE_MUST.desc: ISIS_LEVELS and ISIS_GLOBAL invalidated instance must statement
eStr: The value of ISIS_LEVELS 'instance' must be the same as 'instance' in ISIS_GLOBAL.

ISIS_LEVELS_VRF_MUST.desc: ISIS_LEVELS and ISIS_GLOBAL invalidated vrf must statement
eStr: The value of ISIS_LEVELS 'vrf_name' must be the same as 'vrf_name' in ISIS_GLOBAL.

ISIS_LEVELS_INCORRECT_VALUE_LEVEL_NUMBER.desc: ISIS_LEVELS incorrect value for level_number field

ISIS_LEVELS_INCORRECT_VALUE_LSP_REFRESH_.desc: ISIS_LEVELS incorrect value for lsp_refresh_interval field

ISIS_LEVELS_INCORRECT_VALUE_SPF_REFRESH_.desc: ISIS_LEVELS incorrect value for spf_minimum_interval field

ISIS_LEVELS_INCORRECT_MUST_MAX_REFRESH.desc: ISIS_LEVELS must statement unsatisfied for lsp_refresh_interval
eStr: lsp_maximum_lifetime must be at least 300 seconds greater than lsp_refresh_interval

ISIS_LEVELS_INCORRECT_MUST_GEN_REFRESH.desc: ISIS_LEVELS must statement unsatisfied for lsp_generation_interval
eStr: lsp_generation_interval must be greater than lsp_refresh_interval

ISIS_INTERFACE_INCORRECT_VALUE_PASSIVE.desc: ISIS_INTEFACE incorrect value for passive field

ISIS_INTERFACE_INCORRECT_VALUE_NETWORK_T.desc: ISIS_INTERFACE incorrect value for network_type field

ISIS_INTERFACE_INCORRECT_VALUE_AUTHENTIC.desc: ISIS_INTERFACE incorrect value for authentication_type field

ISIS_INTERFACE_INVALID_MUST_AUTHENTICATI.desc: ISIS_INTERFACE must statement unsatisfied for authentication_type field
eStr: If authentication_type is specified, then authentication_key must also be specified.

ISIS_INTERFACE_INCORRECT_VALUE_METRIC.desc: ISIS_INTERFACE incorrect value for metric field

ISIS_INTERFACE_INCORRECT_VALUE_HELLO_INT.desc: ISIS_INTERFACE incorrect value for hello_interval field
